roleset.name: mid-grade

role.descr: domain, scale that arg1 is in the middle of

example.name: arg1
example.text: My face is medium , my neck slightly darker and my chest so pale -LRB- compare to face and arms -RRB- it 's unbelieveable .

example.name: both args
example.text: Their craft is manifested in the Guatemalan bean which-1 [*-1] is medium in body and high in acidity. ﻿﻿﻿
